name: DienBienPhu Battlefield day tour
description: The trip includes a visit to the historic battle field of Dien Bien Phu , where the French, after nearly 100 years of colonization and nine years of war, were defeated in 1954 by Viet Minh, lead by Ho Chi Minh. You will also enjoy the beautiful scenery and popular hill town of Dien Bien Phu in northwest Vietnam. You will have chance to experience special food of minority people.
